pullRequest.title: Cache hashcode for TypeSignature class
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fix #5780
This improves the cpu cost of building hashmaps and hashsets of
objects that depend on AbstractType#hashCode, by caching the hash
value for TypeSignature objects which is expensive to compute
repeatedly.

nodes.bodyText: // Cached hash code. The class remains effectively immutable, because inputs for hash calculations are immutable.

commit.message:
Cache hashcode for TypeSignature class

This improves the cpu cost of building hashmaps and hashsets of
objects that depend on AbstractType#hashCode, by caching the hash
value for TypeSignature objects which is expensive to compute
repeatedly.
